question: Question_03_(a)
sols:
The characteristic polynomial of A is just the determinant of
$A-I\lambda$

$A - \lambda I = \begin{bmatrix}
2-\lambda &-1 &0 \\ 
-3& -\lambda& -2\\ 
3& 1 &3-\lambda 
\end{bmatrix}$

$det(A-I\lambda) = (2-\lambda)[-\lambda(3-\lambda)+2]+[-3(3-\lambda)+6]$
$=(2-\lambda)(-3\lambda+\lambda^2+2)+3\lambda-3$
$= -\lambda^3+5\lambda^2-5\lambda+1$
